episodes.synopsis: Through interviews with intelligence insiders, cabinet officials and whistle-blowers, "Frontline" examines the government's secret surveillance program.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Frontline explores the role of Silicon Valley in the National Security Agency's controversial surveillance program and the part Edward Snowden played.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Frontline: United States of Secrets
video.synopsis: "Frontline" investigates the secret history of the unprecedented surveillance program that began in the wake of the 9/11 attacks and continues today.
